title.rendered: Air Canada Offers – Premium Economy Sale to Asia and Australia

content.rendered:
Cheap Flights and Premium Economy Sale to Asia and Australia by Air Canada

  • Save on Premium Economy fares on flights for summer travel to Asia and Australia.

Terms and Conditions

  • Fares are valid at time of transmission and apply to new bookings only.
  • All fares are the best available at time of purchase based on the number of tickets requested for your preferred travel dates and times. Fares are guaranteed once you purchase your ticket.
  • Applicable exchange rates were correct at time of transmission, but may vary. Fares are limited; offer may no longer be available on all eligible dates.
  • Final fares may vary depending on the routing, date of departure and return. Fares advertised are based onnon-stop routes. Where Air Canada does not operate non-stop routes, fares may vary depending on the itinerary.

Offer valid for Limited time period

For more details dial 1800 102 8182

To Book Tickets Click Here

View this deal here

About Air Canada

Air Canada is the flag carrier and largest airline of Canada by fleet size and passengers carried. The airline, founded in 1937, provides scheduled and charter air transport for passengers and cargo to 207 destinations worldwide.
